title: Gentleman Zed, Jhin, and Shen skins concept!
body:
http://scontent.cdninstagram.com/t51.2885-15/s480x480/e35/12965871_1736822909896712_1192085697_n.jpg?ig_cache_key=MTIyNjc5Mzg0OTI5NzYzNzE5Mg%3D%3D.2

Shen, in my opinion is the best. He looks so dapper!

######Not my art, props go to the artist on instagram who I can't find.

replies.body: That Zed isn't really a gentleman.
He seems like a more stoic, edgy gentleman.

I think he means he doesn't "respect" women. Whereas...
http://i.imgur.com/9YnSCrQ.jpg

Shen respects women and pretty much anyone who swoons over him.

He just has a silent, "I-don't-notice-your-advances" way of showing it.
Notice me Shenpai
He seems more like a Womanizer or a rich playboy

wow! you actually took the time to draw this!
in my opinion, these are very good skin ideas but here's the thing, but i think it should be a bit lore deeper, like: they are business partners or enemys
This is not his art, I've seen it before.
Yep, it gets reposted every few months

> [{quoted}](name=breakordoom444,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=kXnetwaV,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-08T00:46:38.548+0000)
>
> wow! you actually took the time to draw this!
> in my opinion, these are very good skin ideas but here's the thing, but i think it should be a bit lore deeper, like: they are business partners or enemys

They should have Corporate skins and be competing with each others' business
Love how Shen and Jhin have masks... yet Zed doesn't. These are perfect, Riot please we need these skins.
Too bad we're gonna get another Ahri skin or something instead. Or another PROJECT skin that will not fit the champion.
Project {{champion:75}} calling it right now.
Nah, we are getting Omega Squads. Especially one for Fizz. Because he desperately needs new skin, y'know.
needs to be 4 skins or jhin will kill you
Gentleman Gnar
But there is also Gentleman Cho... x.x

Damn. Jhin and Shen are the best. 
Good shit. 

https://www.pixenli.com/images/1496/1496883264030256200.png

Bob approved
You know that if Bob approves, it is good.
this shen 11/10.
Wow, I love how Shen looks there, it's my favorite of the 3.
Your opinion is valued here, good sir.
I don't like the face mask on Shen. It seems out of place. Give him a hipster beard instead.
This comment is heresy to the point where I won't even downvote it for fear of contracting this particular strain of heresy.
Which part? The bit where I dis the facemask or the part where I suggest that a hipster beard would be bettter? ^_~
Yes.
Mhmmm, Gentleman Shen is gorgeous.

Of course, how could I have made such a grave mistake. I dishonor my past Shen Main status.
Maybe special agent? like Xin.
hot
Oh, so basically Fuckboy Zed, Payday Jhin and Fuckboy Shen. No thanks, we need a break from Fuckboy- and Anime weeb skins. Poolparty Ahri is coming, I think that's enough.

Pool Party Ahri is never coming and your opinions will forever be in the abyss of blackness known as the bottom of the page.

How dare you slander Shen, you miserable reprobate!
weeb

*Looks at name*

Uh-huh...

now the weeb is doing roleplay
w e e b
Web.

Zed fanart without white hair?

REEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE

Seems more "secret agent" or even "debonair" than "gentleman."

But yes, any kind of unmasked skin for these three would be great.  We already have unmasked skins for Kenen and Akali after all.
Well we already have Kennen M.D and Karate Kennen, which is basicly unmasked.
They look cool, but... Zac could finally have his suit
back off, shen's mine

U wot m8

Fite me
alrite, club penguin lesgo 1c1
Riot this is easy money, this is a gud quality idea, if people have been asking for it for years and its still this popular you should do it
zed has white hair
Jhin should have the Golden Gun from 007, and Zed should be a Ginger. Lol
Wee can finally see zeds face :O and half Shen mb Jhin too?

Never knew how much I needed Jhin in a suit until now.
Yes please.
